 <https://storage-masivdrive.masivapp.com/13374/0275ddc3-407d-4507-91f8-5dff70a00a6b/d89f5561-4e3c-43bc-b211-40ad212522df/e2e4d7a8-c6f9-46e5-8613-48ff1737d63c.jpg> 	Meet the Future of Cities from September 25 to 27 at Corferias, Bogota Colombia.

Smart City Expo Bogota, powered by Smart City Expo World Congress, the world's leading event in urban innovation, will bring together experts to share solutions and knowledge on how to build smarter, more sustainable, and inclusive cities addressing topics such as:	  	 
 <https://storage-masivdrive.masivapp.com/13374/0275ddc3-407d-4507-91f8-5dff70a00a6b/d89f5561-4e3c-43bc-b211-40ad212522df/be1eeaa3-e614-4131-bdcf-25f4bb7e7536.jpg> 	
 	  	  	 
 	 Make the most of the benefits!

With your badge, you will have free access to all days of the event, as well as the opportunity to participate in academic activities and receive networking support.

Dive into the urban revolution
at Smart City Expo Bogota

 	 
 	  	  	 
 <https://storage-masivdrive.masivapp.com/13374/0275ddc3-407d-4507-91f8-5dff70a00a6b/d89f5561-4e3c-43bc-b211-40ad212522df/f01c1957-fbf3-49cc-a4a5-061066607271.jpg> 	
	
 	 Why Bogota?

Bogota is the capital of the Colombian Republic and the department of Cundinamarca. It is made up of 20 localities and is the political, economic, administrative, industrial, artistic, cultural, sports and tourist hub of the country, where multiculturalism and diversity converge.	  	  <https://u29829010.ct.sendgrid.net/ls/click?upn=u001.vdCyhW61AVo-2Fk5kwjWed-2B4Upz3qfM4IzU3OjACCEfcICJ6CaxM3ogMbHBjKg-2BW4kdg3niSkldnX8E8YHVIjr1F7MfQQvVvz4Ppi8-2Bw7LcS9gJBaxbq9e-2FJ8BI7eagIn-2B5lmgD9fmXW3PL7aBXi38ig-3D-3D3BIG_GAAyZnG-2FQ-2F2RwzQjN-2Fk1Caf22p6pzaT2DtjuAht0FIoC06Ig6-2B3ErtOrGP-2Bd2bklvK0BQvaE0iPoi7wXMul77OfPd8E-2BeV-2FudpRpbRLg5-2F-2BTvVs94D2MWT2KzSdWQXUHB5Ju6Fe1jH32Y8e6xjhWuxx6Z8M-2Ba8cIqPRqnhg9BYGmaSOv39H9v6NiB4Useb3q2xgStp4xgEQF07-2BK9PFFxmfzip8l4qhoIie7rqJro9tr-2FAChyWtJgnuUv6n-2BhmJSEIlQs933KXnE4undxUI2uRA4tADaqLJn3qe1-2BGEeqf5mquVEqbVj5W7LSaFg7kMe0IhuoopVFzEnehccD9iPqtNlCc6IpEnEwpCr-2FD0-2B8XVYVadieVJltjUY8IsPiACMVUSI0TKqlNHsAPukGXnd7zaumkZuwPbFSD7Tn0RAvtfUQgk6d6qxO4dQfZiXT-2BQK4BG8nsGENIrC74eUGbAIhslQ3sEwicJQLG-2Fvb-2FI-2F82h8Jvz83bh41O6ck8Ty9nDaFNdTfp1m9ev50FZWSHKK-2BuAqvvPY612u3Rig8Bprj9w-3D>
